mapper.update: UPDATE employee_information_tb SET ed_code = #{edCode}, dd_code = #{ddCode}, emp_pass = #{employeePass}, emp_name = #{employeeName}, emp_phone = #{employeePhone}, emp_addr = #{employeeAddr}, boss_name = #{bossName} WHERE ei_code = #{employeeCode};
mapper.insert:
SELECT CONCAT('emp',(SELECT LPAD(RIGHT(MAX(e.ei_code),3)+1,3,'0'))) as employeeCode FROM employee_information_tb AS e
INSERT INTO employee_information_tb ( ei_code, bs_code, ed_code, dd_code, emp_pass, emp_name, emp_birth, emp_phone, emp_gender, emp_addr, join_date, boss_name, ei_date )VALUES( #{employeeCode}, #{bsCode}, #{edCode}, #{ddCode}, #{employeePass}, #{employeeName}, #{employeeBirth}, #{employeePhone}, #{employeeGender}, #{employeeAddr}, #{joinDate}, #{bossName}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT B.dp_name, C.duty_name, A.* FROM employee_information_tb A LEFT JOIN employee_department_tb B ON A.ed_code = B.ed_code LEFT JOIN department_duty_tb C ON A.dd_code = C.dd_code WHERE A.bs_code= #{bsCode};

SELECT '부서' AS c_code, E.dp_name, E.ed_code FROM employee_department_tb AS E INNER JOIN department_duty_tb AS D ON E.bs_code = D.bs_code WHERE E.use_check = 'Y' AND E.bs_code = #{bsCode} GROUP BY E.dp_name UNION SELECT '직책' AS c_code, D.duty_name, D.dd_code FROM employee_department_tb AS E INNER JOIN department_duty_tb AS D ON E.bs_code = D.bs_code WHERE D.use_check = 'Y' AND E.bs_code = #{bsCode} GROUP BY D.duty_name;
